scripts.publish:nightly: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const version = pkg.version.split('-')[0] + '-nightly.' + new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.T-]/g, '').substring(0,14); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify({...pkg, version}, null, 2)); console.log('Version updated to ' + version)" && npm publish --tag nightly
